headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: campaign_ids
parameters.description: The ID list of TikTok One Creator Marketplace campaigns. Max size: 5. To create a campaign and obtain the campaign ID, use /tto/tcm/campaign/create/ .

parameters.name: campaign_type
parameters.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum value: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link . Default value: CAMPAIGN .

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: â‰¥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-5. Default value: 5.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: campaigns
fields.description: The list of TTO Creator Marketplace campaigns.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign.

fields.name: campaign_type
fields.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum values: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link .

fields.name: brand_profile_id
fields.description: The ID of the Brand Profile associated with the campaign.

fields.name: brand_name
fields.description: Brand name.

fields.name: campaign_name
fields.description: Campaign name.

fields.name: handle_names
fields.description: The handle name list of TikTok creators that the campaign is for.

fields.name: campaign_description
fields.description: Campaign description.

fields.name: anchor_id
fields.description: The ID of the anchor that is associated with the campaign.

fields.name: video_ids
fields.description: List of video IDs linked to the campaign.

fields.name: advertiser_ids
fields.description: A list of ad accounts that the campaign is associated with. When a creator's video is linked to the campaign, these ad accounts will automatically be granted Spark Ads authorization for the video.

fields.name: spark_ads_requested_authorization_days
fields.description: The default Spark Ads authorization days for videos uploaded to the campaign. Enum values: 0, 7, 30, 60, 180, 365.

fields.name: invite_link
fields.description: The invite link that is associated with the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the campaign was created, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0 time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:01 .

fields.name: country_codes
fields.description: The list of country or region codes associated with the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. This field represents the regions where the creators invited to the campaign are located. To learn about the values that might be returned for this field, see Location code . You can pass the field value to the Header parameter Country-Code in /tto/tcm/report/ to obtain video-level reports for a specific region for a TikTok One Creator Marketplace campaign. Example: CA .

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Page information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total number of pages.

fields.name: dm_info
fields.description: Direct messaging link information.

fields.name: business_account_handle
fields.description: The handle (username) of the Business Account.

fields.name: dm_allowed
fields.description: Whether direct messaging is allowed. Supported values: true (allowed), false (not allowed).
